title: Unheard Voices: The Handwritten Story of Eric Gassy and the Injustice He Faced
author: Eric Gassy
snippet: Amid ink-stained pages and whispered truths, Eric Gassy's narrative emerges—a testament to an indomitable spirit, unyielding to silence.

title: Eric Gassy's Appeal Denied: The Battle Rages On
author: Eric Gassy
snippet: Eric Gassy’s quest for justice faces another hurdle as his court appeal is denied. Despite this setback, the fight continues, with supporters rallying behind him.
